[[File:Ubisoft Motion Track camera Wii.jpg|thumb|200px|The Ubisoft Motion Tracking Camera is used for the Wii version of the Game]]
 
The "Your Shape" game released for the Wii requires the [[Ubisoft Motion Tracking Camera]] so the game can track the body movement while performing the different exercises.
